data.name: Farm Wars
data.detailed_description:
HOW TO PLAY
Farm Wars is an online-PVP game that has a day and night loop. In the daytime, you buy seeds and plant your field; at night, you attack your opponent with your chosen animal.You can protect your crops with the defense items on the shop. You can create a game lobby and wait for other players or just invite your friends. Alternatively, you can directly join another lobby and compete against foreign players.

EARLY GAME
At the beginning of the game, each player determine the price of their fields. Then the prices are compared. Half of the difference between the high and low prices is added to the starting gold of the player who determined the lower field price.

IN THE GAME
When the game starts, players begin to buy seeds/items from the shop and plant and defense their fields. When the day ends, night comes.

ANIMAL SELECTION SCREEN
Players start the nights with the animal selection screen. A random selection is made unless a player does not select an animal within the specified time. You can choose each animal up to 2 times in a row. If you choose the same animal for 2 nights, it will be locked for the other night.

NIGHT
Players teleport each other's fields after the animal selection screen. If your opponent built defense items against your chosen animal, you cannot attack this region. You can attack and destroy the unprotected areas by clicking on them and preventing your opponent from earning money from these crops. If you destroy a crop that your opponent has placed a mine on, you will die. When you are dead, you cannot attack until the next night.

END GAME
You win when your gold reaches your opponent's field price that they determined at the start. If any player cannot reach the target gold until the 10th day, the player wins who has the closest gold to their opponent's field price.

data.short_description: Set a price for your farm and protect it. Your shapeshifter farmer will help you harvest your farm and destroy your rival’s farm. Farm Wars is a top-down PvP farm game against time. Create a strategy for your opponent and purchase their farm. Pay attention to the mines while making your attack!

  • Graphics: Onboard
